statements: SELECT task_id, task_name, description, stored_procedure FROM DataCleansingTasks
SELECT * FROM DataCleansingTasks
SELECT task_name, description FROM DataCleansingTasks WHERE task_id = 3
SELECT * FROM DataCleansingTasks WHERE description LIKE '%clean%'
SELECT task_name, stored_procedure FROM DataCleansingTasks ORDER BY task_name DESC
SELECT * FROM DataCleansingTasks ORDER BY task_id DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT task_name, description FROM DataCleansingTasks WHERE task_id = 3
SELECT task_name, stored_procedure FROM DataCleansingTasks WHERE task_name LIKE 'Data%'
SELECT * FROM DataCleansingTasks WHERE task_id IN (1, 2, 4)
SELECT task_name, description FROM DataCleansingTasks WHERE stored_procedure IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM DataCleansing;
SELECT id, data_processed FROM DataCleansing;
SELECT task_id, task_description, task_status FROM ForecastingTasks;
SELECT * FROM DataCleansing WHERE id = 1;
SELECT task_description FROM ForecastingTasks WHERE task_status = 'pending';
SELECT * FROM DataCleansing WHERE data_processed LIKE '%clean%' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, data_processed FROM DataCleansing WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT task_description, task_status FROM ForecastingTasks WHERE task_status = 'pending' ORDER BY task_id;
SELECT * FROM ForecastingTasks WHERE task_description LIKE '%analysis%' ORDER BY task_id DESC;

SELECT * FROM DataCleansing JOIN ForecastingTasks ON DataCleansing.id = ForecastingTasks.task_id WHERE DataCleansing.id < 10 AND (ForecastingTasks.task_status = 'completed' OR ForecastingTasks.task_status = 'in-progress') ORDER BY DataCleansing.id ASC;
SELECT * FROM data_cleansing_tasks
SELECT task_id, task_description FROM data_preprocessing_tasks
SELECT forecast_description FROM forecasting_tasks WHERE forecast_id = 1
SELECT * FROM data_cleansing_tasks ORDER BY task_id DESC
SELECT preprocessing_description FROM data_preprocessing_tasks WHERE preprocessing_id = 2
SELECT * FROM data_cleansing_tasks ORDER BY task_id DESC;
SELECT task_description, task_script FROM data_preprocessing_tasks WHERE preprocessing_id > 5;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_forecasting_tasks FROM forecasting_tasks;
SELECT * FROM data_cleansing_tasks WHERE task_script LIKE '%clean%';
SELECT forecast_description FROM forecasting_tasks WHERE forecast_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM data_cleansing_tasks;
SELECT task_name, created_at FROM preprocessing_tasks;
SELECT task_id, task_description FROM forecasting_tasks WHERE task_id = 1;
SELECT task_id, log_message FROM task_logs ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT task_name, task_description, created_at FROM data_cleansing_tasks WHERE task_name LIKE 'Data%' ORDER BY created_at ASC;
SELECT * FROM data_cleansing_tasks ORDER BY task_name DESC;
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM preprocessing_tasks WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT task_id, task_name, created_at FROM forecasting_tasks WHERE task_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT task_id, COUNT(*) AS num_logs FROM task_logs GROUP BY task_id HAVING num_logs > 10;
SELECT task_name, log_message FROM task_logs JOIN task_logs ON data_cleansing_tasks.task_id = task_logs.task_id;
SELECT * FROM data_cleansing_tasks;
SELECT task_description FROM data_cleansing_tasks WHERE task_id = 1;
SELECT task_id, task_description FROM data_cleansing_tasks ORDER BY task_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM cleansing_logs WHERE log_timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT task_description, task_query FROM preprocessing_tasks WHERE task_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM data_cleansing_tasks ORDER BY task_id ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT task_description, task_query FROM data_cleansing_tasks WHERE task_id > 3
SELECT log_message, log_timestamp FROM cleansing_logs WHERE task_id = 2 ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC
SELECT task_id, task_description, LEN(task_query) AS query_length FROM data_cleansing_tasks WHERE task_id = 1
SELECT * FROM preprocessing_tasks WHERE preprocessing_query LIKE '%JOIN%'
